Docs.param: The name of the property being listened to
Docs.summary: Returns an array of all the listeners which have been associated with the named property.
Docs.returns: all of the PropertyChangeListeners associated with the named property. If no such listeners have been added, or if propertyName is null, an empty array is returned.
